CONJUGATES: yogurts | yoghurt (UK spelling variant) | yoghourt (archaic variant)
ETYMOLOGY: From Ottoman Turkish yoğurt, derived from the verb yoğurmak ('to thicken, curdle').

MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A semi-solid food made from milk that has been fermented by bacteria, resulting in a slightly sour taste. It is often sweetened or flavored with fruit.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 一种半固态食物，由牛奶经细菌发酵制成，味道微酸。通常会加糖或水果来调味。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: I prefer Greek yogurt because it has a thicker consistency and higher protein content.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 我更喜欢希腊酸奶，因为它质地更浓稠，蛋白质含量更高。
